item.description:
**BIG EVENT**BYPA's Friday the 13th Black on Black 4 Year Anniversary Bash at Saint (General Admission)

Date
Friday, April 13, 2007
Time
7-10pm
Premium Member Price
$5.00
Basic and NonMember Price
$10.00
Location
Saint - 90 Exeter Street, Boston Get Directions
Closest Public Transportation
Copley on the Green Line

Join us to celebrate Lucky 13 and BYPA?s Lucky Big 4th Anniversary!!!

Can you believe it's almost been FOUR YEARS?!?!?! BYPA has come a long way in four years, from an organization of 500+ in 2003, to an organization of over 10,000 in 2007!

For our Four Year Bash, we thought it was important to do something great, with a little flair from our beginning, so we're bringing back the first part from 2003 that ever sold out - the Friday the 13th Black on Black Party at Saint! Back then, we held it in the back room, "The Bordello Room" for 150 people. In 2007, we're taking over THE WHOLE CLUB!

Get your black outfits ready, and come out and celebrate with us!!! We're going to have black beads, black masks, and celebrate Friday the 13th in Spooky Style!

And if you get your tickets now, it's so cheap to get in! Get your tickets by March 20th and save $5 each!

What your ticket includes:


Two drink tickets which can be used from 7-7:45pm which include rail liquors, domestic beer and house wine

Friday the 13th Black on Black Goodies - Black Beads and Black Masks!

BYPA 4 Year Anniversary Birthday Cake!

General Admission to the 4 Year Anniversary Bash with almost 500 Young Professionals out to Celebrate with us!

The ability to stay and play at Saint after the party with no additional admission fee

Dress: Wear your sexiest, most fashionable ?Friday the 13th? Black on Black outfit: Best male and female outfit win a cache of prizes! Everyone who wears all black gets SPECIAL Anniversary goodies!

Keep a lookout as we add more exciting details to our most exciting birthday bash yet!

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Friday the 13th Anniversary Bash!!!
